title: Earring
description: Gold earring – Loop a gold wire bent in form of question-mark. To front face is soldered an openwork rosette enframing circular setting (set lost); below, an openwork bar from which depend 3 pendants; pointed garnets in diamond-shaped settings; with globular iridescent glass beads below. One garnet missing.
dimensions: Diam. of rosette 9/16 x 3 1/4 in. (1.5 x 8.3 cm)

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
